The other players donate clothes to you, you must redress so you're only wearing the donated clothes

Lick this womans breast
Cares this person of the opposite genders crotch
Take an icecube in your mouth, pass it using only your mouth to another player, they must then pass it to a third player etc. until the icecube has melted
You look thirsty, drink *2@4* times
Play a round of 'Never have I ever'
For the next two turns you must end every sentence with *wordEnding*, if you forget you must drink
From now on all other players must refer to you as *title*, if they forget they must *drinkStrip*
The *youngOld* player must drink
All beardless players drink

Waterfall!
Everyone starts drinking, players must drink till the player on their left stops, starting with you
Until your next turn you must copy whatever this player does, drink whenever you forget
Everyone must look as serious as possible, the first player to laugh downs their drink
All players must touch you. The last player to do so must drink
The most sober player downs their drink
The player wearing the *leastMost* clothes must drink
Clearly you are a very lucky person, you've just won 3 extra turns
You drew a dud, sit back and enjoy the nothingness as you hand this device to the next player
Whomever the bottle points at must ask you a kitchen related question, if you fail to answer, you must drink
You must speak in a seductive voice for the rest of the game, every time you forget, you must drink
The last player to shout 'PENIS' drinks
Do an impression, the rest must try to guess of who
Players, starting with you, must name a *brandName* within the category of *category*, first to fail drinks
The person with the *age* cellphone drinks
This player must sing the start of a song and you must continue it. If you succeed he must drink, otherwise you drink
The players sitting on either side of you must kiss each other
Play Rock Paper scissors with this player, the loser removes *12pieces* of clothing
Until your next turn you must imitate everything this player does. Every time you forget, you must drink
All players must stand up, the last player to do so must drink
Next time someone empties their glass they must shout "It's showtime!", all other players must drink, the last person to do so must empty their glass
Stand on one leg till your next turn
Try to seduce this player
The other players must agree on a challenge for you, you must do this or empty your drink
The other players must agree on an animal, until your next turn you must act as this animal, if you forget, you must drink

Fuck google, ask this guy instead!
Until your next turn players can ask you anything, everytime you can't answer, you must drink
For every drink you finish (from full) until your next turn, this player must remove 1 piece of clothing.
From now and till your next turn, whenever someone drinks, you must swap seats with them
Swap seats with this person
Place a shot on this persons belly and drink it without using hands
